title: Update
body: I cant go on my friends list I cant check notifications its glitched can anyone help me with it?

replies.body: Is it simply not connecting to the chat server? If it's not connected you won't be able to use the social functions, and there will be a "Reconnect to Chat" button on the bottom left.

If the 'reconnect to chat' button isn't resolving it for you, then it's possible that you're experiencing an issue connecting to the PVP.net service entirely. In this case, I'd recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to resolve this.

Let me know if it helped.
